title: Domestic travel spending in France 2012 to 2028
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in billion euros, containing a total of 8 data points.
In general Spending in billion euros has rose over the Year.
Spending in billion euros is roughly constant from 2012 to 2017, and finally slightly increasing from 2017 to 2028.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2018 and 2028.
Maximum Spending in billion euros, about 131.4 was reported at Year 2028
Minimum Spending in billion euros about 107.2 was reached at Year 2012
